summary:
Adds light versions of the Nordic Armor. Just weight drop, changed from heavy to light, and dropped the armor rating too, but not a whole lot. 
Also have a not so lore friendly, with major weight drop and higher rating. Plus a one handed version of the Nordic Greatsword.
Must have Dragonborn DLC!!!
descriptionHtml:
Must have the Dragonborn DLC. This is an addition to the Nordic Carved Armor from Dragonborn DLC.

Just adds Nordic light armor. I like light armor, but the nordic armor looks cool.

I also added the Nordic Greatsword as a one handed weapon.

Nothing to big just lowered the weight, and even the armor rating, not by much though, but still somewhat lore friendly.

Everything can be tempered too.

BUGS:
Only one right now, as I am having trouble with the One handed Greatsword, not working right. Its there, and equips, but when I try to use it the model stays sheathed and my character is doing one handed combat with an invisible sword. Some advice could be appreciated.

Well as far as the sword not working for the player, as seen in the images it works for NPCs, my Alayna follower was able to use it. So theres a plus.

Hope you like it.
author: Jrew
